overview: Steve Rives is in jail, and Elliot Gass tries to keep a grip of the bad boys of Bareback Twink Street. Money's tight, and straight blondie Ron Pexit's f-rced to earn a buck fucking a cute twink on film for porn pennies. Jay Renfro steals a car radio, but its horse-hung owner makes him pay back... bareback! Boyish and broke, the paper boy gets his ass munched and hole punched, while the DJ's van rocks to the rhythm of a bareback gang bang. But it's fight night at the boxing club. All the boys slug it out. The winner leads the street... and the loser take them all! Gritty, raw and wild, Bareback Twink Street 2 will have you spunkbound.
title: Bareback Twink Street 2
